title: President Rajapaksa Begins Official Visit to Japan
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa arrived in Japan Tuesday (12) morning on a four-day official visit. President Rajapaksa and First Lady Shiranthi Wickramasinghe Rajapaksa were received by Mr. Minoru Kiuchi, Parliamentary Vice Minister for Foreign Affairs in Japan, Admiral (RETD.) Wasantha Karannagoda, Sri Lankan Ambassador in Japan and Mr. Nobuhito Hobo, Japanese Ambassador in Sri Lanka at…
